articles.title: Inside Mirakl's agentic commerce vision
articles.summary: Mirakl is pioneering "agentic commerce," a new retail paradigm where AI-powered agents facilitate personalized shopping experiences, streamlining interactions between buyers, sellers, and products. This innovative approach aims to revolutionize the way businesses connect with customers and manage their online marketplaces. By leveraging AI-driven agents, Mirakl's vision promises to enhance efficiency, flexibility, and customer satisfaction in the e-commerce landscape.

articles.title: Funding grants for new research into AI and mental health
articles.summary: Researchers have been awarded funding grants to explore the intersection of AI and mental health, aiming to develop innovative solutions for diagnosis, treatment, and support. This new research has the potential to revolutionize mental health care by leveraging AI's capabilities in data analysis and personalized interventions. The grants will enable scientists to investigate how AI can improve mental health outcomes and reduce the stigma surrounding mental illness.

articles.title: OpenAI and NORAD team up to bring new magic to “NORAD Tracks Santa”
articles.summary: OpenAI has partnered with NORAD to enhance the "NORAD Tracks Santa" program, leveraging AI technology to create a more immersive and interactive experience for children tracking Santa's journey on Christmas Eve. This collaboration aims to bring new magic to the beloved tradition, which has been a holiday staple for over 60 years. With OpenAI's innovative technology, the program is set to deliver a more engaging and personalized experience for kids worldwide.

articles.title: Accenture and OpenAI accelerate enterprise AI success
articles.summary: Accenture has partnered with OpenAI to help businesses accelerate their AI adoption and drive innovation. This collaboration aims to enable enterprises to harness the power of AI and achieve tangible results, from improving operational efficiency to enhancing customer experiences. By combining Accenture's industry expertise with OpenAI's cutting-edge technology, companies can unlock new opportunities for growth and transformation.

articles.title: OpenAI takes an ownership stake in Thrive Holdings to accelerate enterprise AI adoption
articles.summary: OpenAI has taken an ownership stake in Thrive Holdings, a move aimed at accelerating the adoption of artificial intelligence in enterprises. This partnership is expected to enable Thrive to leverage OpenAI's cutting-edge technology, driving innovation and growth in the industry. By joining forces, the two companies aim to make AI more accessible and effective for businesses, revolutionizing the way they operate.

articles.title: AlphaFold: Five years of impact
articles.summary: AlphaFold, a revolutionary AI model developed by DeepMind, has made significant strides in protein structure prediction over the past five years, transforming the field of biology and accelerating medical research. Its impact has enabled scientists to better understand diseases and develop new treatments, with potential applications in fields such as cancer and infectious diseases. By predicting protein structures with unprecedented accuracy, AlphaFold has opened up new avenues for scientific discovery and innovation.

articles.title: Revealing a key protein behind heart disease
articles.summary: Researchers have identified a key protein that plays a crucial role in the development of heart disease, paving the way for potential new treatments. This breakthrough discovery could lead to more effective therapies for preventing and managing cardiovascular conditions. By targeting this protein, scientists may be able to reduce the risk of heart disease and improve patient outcomes.

articles.title: How we’re bringing AI image verification to the Gemini app
articles.summary: Gemini is integrating AI-powered image verification into its app, enabling users to easily authenticate the legitimacy of images and protect themselves from potential scams. This innovative feature utilizes machine learning to detect and flag suspicious images, promoting a safer and more trustworthy experience. By leveraging AI technology, Gemini aims to stay ahead of emerging threats and provide enhanced security for its users.

articles.title: Build with Nano Banana Pro, our Gemini 3 Pro Image model
articles.summary: Nano Banana Pro, a cutting-edge model, has been released as part of the Gemini 3 Pro Image series, enabling developers to build innovative applications with enhanced image capabilities. This model is expected to revolutionize image processing and generation, opening up new possibilities for AI-powered technologies. With Nano Banana Pro, creators can now tap into advanced image generation and manipulation features, driving progress in various fields.

articles.title: Introducing Nano Banana Pro
articles.summary: The Nano Banana Pro is a new, ultra-compact single-board computer that packs a punch with its powerful specs and tiny footprint. This innovative device is designed for makers, developers, and IoT enthusiasts, offering a range of possibilities for building and creating small-scale projects. With its impressive capabilities, the Nano Banana Pro is set to revolutionize the world of miniaturized computing.

articles.title: Transformers v5: Simple model definitions powering the AI ecosystem
articles.summary: The latest Transformers v5 release simplifies model definitions, empowering developers to easily integrate and customize AI models. This update fuels the AI ecosystem by providing a more accessible and flexible framework for building and deploying transformer-based models. By streamlining model development, Transformers v5 accelerates innovation in natural language processing and beyond.

articles.title: Diffusers welcomes FLUX-2
articles.summary: Diffusers has introduced FLUX-2, a new model that enhances its capabilities in generating high-quality images and videos. This update is expected to bring significant improvements in terms of speed, efficiency, and overall performance. With FLUX-2, users can create more realistic and detailed content, opening up new possibilities for creative applications.

articles.title: Continuous batching from first principles
articles.summary: Researchers have introduced a new approach to continuous batching, a technique that enables more efficient processing of data in artificial intelligence and machine learning models. This method, derived from first principles, has the potential to improve the performance and scalability of AI systems. By optimizing batching processes, this innovation can lead to faster and more accurate data processing in various applications.

articles.title: 20x Faster TRL Fine-tuning with RapidFire AI
articles.summary: RapidFire AI has introduced a groundbreaking technology that accelerates TRL fine-tuning by 20 times, revolutionizing the field of artificial intelligence. This innovation enables faster and more efficient model training, paving the way for significant advancements in AI applications. With RapidFire AI, developers can now fine-tune models at unprecedented speeds, unlocking new possibilities for AI-driven solutions.

articles.title: Open ASR Leaderboard: Trends and Insights with New Multilingual & Long-Form Tracks
articles.summary: The Open ASR Leaderboard has introduced new multilingual and long-form tracks, allowing for more diverse and challenging speech recognition evaluations. This update enables researchers to test their models on a wider range of languages and audio formats, driving innovation in automatic speech recognition (ASR) technology. The expanded leaderboard is expected to foster advancements in ASR, improving its accuracy and applicability in real-world scenarios.

articles.title: IBM CEO says there is 'no way' spending on AI data centers will pay off
articles.summary: IBM's CEO has expressed skepticism about the financial viability of investing in AI data centers, stating that the returns may not justify the costs. This comment highlights the challenges of making AI-driven infrastructure profitable, despite its potential for innovation and growth. The statement may have significant implications for the tech industry, which has heavily invested in AI data centers in recent years.

articles.title: OpenAI declares 'code red' as Google catches up in AI race
articles.summary: OpenAI has reportedly issued a "code red" alert as Google's AI advancements threaten to overtake its own technologies, marking a significant shift in the AI landscape. Google's recent breakthroughs in natural language processing and machine learning have narrowed the gap with OpenAI, prompting a sense of urgency to accelerate innovation. This development could lead to a new era of AI competition, driving faster progress and more innovative applications.

articles.title: Amazon launches Trainium3
articles.summary: Amazon has launched Trainium3, a new custom-designed AI chip that significantly accelerates machine learning training workloads. This innovation enables faster and more efficient training of large AI models, allowing for breakthroughs in areas like natural language processing and computer vision. With Trainium3, Amazon aims to enhance its cloud-based AI services and provide customers with improved performance and reduced costs.

articles.title: Ecosia: The greenest AI is here
articles.summary: Ecosia, a search engine that uses its profits to plant trees, has launched an AI model that aims to be the most environmentally friendly. This AI is trained on renewable energy and is designed to reduce carbon emissions, making it a more sustainable option for businesses and individuals. By leveraging this green AI, Ecosia hopes to further its mission of using technology to combat climate change.

articles.title: Qwen3-VL can scan two-hour videos and pinpoint nearly every detail
articles.summary: Qwen3-VL, a cutting-edge AI model, can scan two-hour videos and accurately identify nearly every detail, including objects, actions, and events. This breakthrough technology has the potential to revolutionize video analysis, enabling applications such as enhanced content moderation and improved video search functionality. With its unprecedented level of accuracy, Qwen3-VL is poised to transform the way we interact with and understand video content.

articles.title: AI generated font using Nano Banana
articles.summary: A new AI-generated font has been created using the "Nano Banana" technique, which utilizes machine learning algorithms to produce unique and stylized typography. This innovative approach allows for the generation of fonts with intricate details and patterns, pushing the boundaries of traditional font design. The result is a distinctive and futuristic font that showcases the creative potential of AI in graphic design.

articles.title: Mistral 3 family of models released
articles.summary: The Mistral 3 family of models has been released, offering significant advancements in AI capabilities and performance. This new generation of models is expected to drive innovation in areas such as natural language processing and machine learning. With improved efficiency and accuracy, the Mistral 3 models have the potential to revolutionize various industries and applications.
